Description: The following statement contains a magic number: dynamic i = c.QuerySql("SELECT p=@p' q=@q' r=@p"' new { p = 5' q = 9 }).First();
The following statement contains a magic number: dynamic i = c.QuerySql("SELECT p=@p' q=@q' r=@p"' new { p = 5' q = 9 }).First();
The following statement contains a magic number: Assert.AreEqual(5' i.p);
The following statement contains a magic number: Assert.AreEqual(9' i.q);
The following statement contains a magic number: Assert.AreEqual(5' i.r);
